Export.Routine: EXISTINGCODE Write !,"Call this routine using Do EVARS^EXISTINGCODE" Quit EVARS Set eVAR1=1 Set eVAR2=2 Set eVAR3=3 Set eVAR4=4 Set eVAR5=5 Set eVAR6=6 Set eVAR7=7 Set eVAR8=8 Quit
INTERVARS1(iVAR1,iVAR2,iVAR3,iVAR4) D EVARS^EXISTINGCODE Set iVAR1=$GET(eVAR1) Set iVAR2=$GET(eVAR2) Set iVAR3=$GET(eVAR3) Set iVAR4=$GET(eVAR4) Quit
INTERVARS2(arrayVars) Set arrayVars("eVAR5")=$GET(eVAR5) Set arrayVars("eVAR6")=$GET(eVAR6) Set arrayVars("eVAR7")=$GET(eVAR7) Set arrayVars("eVAR8")=$GET(eVAR8) Quit

Method.name: Run
